entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:03 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
